title: Sword of Justice
content:
Sword of Justice Uncommon 3~13 Damage 2d6 +1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Tyr's ProtectionLevel 1 Abjuration Spell Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The words "Deliverance. Justice. Vengeance." are engraved on the base of this sword. They echo in your mind. Greatsword Two-Handed 2.7 130
